CustomField.description: The action of the Secondary Button. For an External Page button, the external URL. For an SFDC New Tab button, the format is "{pageReference}:{objectOrPageApiName}:{action}". See the Lightning NavigationMixin Documentation for examples and all specs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The action of the Secondary Button. For an External Page button, the external URL. For an SFDC New Tab button, the format is "{pageReference}:{objectOrPageApiName}:{action}". See the Lightning NavigationMixin Documentation for examples and all specs.
CustomField.label: Secondary Button Value
